The National Archaeological Museum of Basilicata is an archaeological museum located in Potenza, Italy. It is located at the Palazzo Loffredo and holds objects discovered from excavations in the surrounding territory. It is dedicated to archaeologist Dinu Adame»ôteanu.
The museum provides a general overview of the archaeological finds of the region of Basilicata. The exhibition  follows a chronological and geographical order. (English summary)
Some excavated items
